channel.title: Blogging on Beautiful Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on Beautiful Hugo

item.title: vVotemageddon 2015
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: As has become a yearly tradition, the vote is on. Pick your favorite VMware & virtualization blogs and give Eric Siebert loads of work. https://twitter.com/ericsiebert/status/572493098464370688 I hope the good guys at Infinio who sponsors Top vBlog 2015 also offers some assistance in doing some of the legwork required to get the results accumulated. Also, don’t be an ass. Go cast your vote now.
